## halfToFloat() function

Converts half float value to float

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function halfToFloat(val: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  val | number | A 16-bits integer presents the half float value to be converted. |

**Returns:**

number

The converted float value
